Commentary.ab: Y19.13a ā.drəṇjaiieiti] sec. cod. (cf. VS9.14 ā.drəṇjaiiōiš); Geldner, Kellens ādrəṇjaiieiti.
Y19.13b-c kāraiieiti] on the meaning, vid. Kellens, 2010 pp. 36-37; Skjaervo, 1989 p. 400.
Y19.13c yat̰ dim dāmabiiō cinasti] sec. Kellens; Geldner in Y19.14. PT together with Y19.14a.

Parallels.ab: vaŋhə̄uš ... dazda manaŋhō ... š́iiaōϑənanąm quotes YAV.b vaŋhə̄uš dazdā manaŋhō š́iiaōϑananąm.
fradaxštārəm manaŋhe quotes Y31.17 (Kellens, 2010, p. 42) vaŋhə̄uš fradaxštā manaŋhō.
